item.title: #en @ 1508504347642155012
item.description: How shameful is @MBGov? They said they would no longer UPDATE the covid dashboards and datasets, but they also DELETED all the EXISTING covid data from their "OPEN DATA" website. There were 13 datasets deleted today. All historical data gone. Transparency & accountability my ass. https://t.co/MncjjfCJ79

item.title: #en @ 1507460772544212995
item.description:
Looking at inter-provincial migration today to Calgary, and how that can be visualized from the @cityofcalgary open data.
In a way, the map re-enforces what other charts tell us. Namely, that most of the locations people move to Calgary from is in Alberta and B.C. #yyc #dataviz https://t.co/DeKFG1mhk5
